attributes.action: base the road tax on amount of seats in the car corresponding to amount of people in the family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: car size should be directly relevant to the size of the family i.e. penalise 3, 4 or 5 person families if they have a seven seater but create a fair tax for 6/7 person families who have no other option. likewise country residents may need four wheel drive where city dwellers do not.
